* A comment
*** My special header
* My intro for class RCLS
* My intro for class LCLS
* My intro for class CCLS
* My intro for class DCLS
* My intro for class M3CLS
* My intro for class M4CLS

* cell C1
* pin p1
* pin p2
.SUBCKT C1 1 2
* net 1 n1
* net 2 n2
* net 3 n3
* device instance $1 0,0 RCLS
* Before device $0
* Terminal #1: 0
* Terminal #2: 0
R$0 0 0 1.7
* After device $0
* device instance $2 0,0 RCLS
* Before device $0
* Terminal #1: 0
* Terminal #2: 0
R$0 0 0 4.2e-05
* After device $0
.ENDS C1
